医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
2020 年 4 月，美国 COVID-19 大流行期间，成人癌症诊断减少了一半美国癌症协会 (ACS) 研究人员的一项新研究发现，2020 年 4 月，在美国 COVID-19 大流行期间，每月成人癌症诊断量减少了一半。下降幅度最大的是 I 期癌症，导致晚期诊断的比例更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Adult-cancer-diagnoses-reduced-by-half-in-April-2020-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-in-the-US。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Adult-cancer-diagnoses-reduced-by-half-in-April-2020-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-in-the-US。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efc4d039-388c-4e98-a126-cf1b8652ad39 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 00:00:13 -0400 Adult cancer diagnoses reduced by half in April 2020 during the COVID-19 pandemic in the U.S
研究加深了对调节性 T 细胞产生治疗益处的了解数十年的研究留下了关于调节免疫系统的细胞的知识空白：普渡大学和美国国立卫生研究院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-offers-deeper-understanding-of-regulatory-T-cells-yielding-therapeutic-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-offers-deeper-understanding-of-regulatory-T-cells-yielding-therapeutic-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7331ea66-23c7-41cc-af7e-fe183e9541ab Tue, 01 Aug 2023 23:51:55 -0400 Study offers deeper understanding of regulatory T cells yielding therapeutic benefits
纽约大学 Langone Health 入选 2023-24 年度 20 强医院荣誉榜纽约大学朗格健康中心因其对特殊主义的坚定承诺，再次在《美国新闻与世界报道》年度“最佳医院”排名中脱颖而出，并入选 2023-24 年度 20 强医院荣誉榜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/NYU-Langone-Health-included-on-the-2023-24-Honor-Roll-of-top-20-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/NYU-Langone-Health-included-on-the-2023-24-Honor-Roll-of-top-20-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc81ffd8-606f-48df-bfca-6e4922045671 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 22:37:00 -0400 NYU Langone Health included on the 2023-24 Honor Roll of top 20 hospitals
非侵入性脑刺激有望治疗儿童多动症萨里大学和耶路撒冷希伯来大学联合领导的新研究表明，非侵入性脑刺激与认知训练相结合，可以显着改善儿童注意力缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Non-induced-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-treating-ADHD-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Non-induced-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-treating-ADHD-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a71fab97-dbe4-42ac-afd1-fca098933ae8 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 22:34:22 -0400 Non-invasive brain stimulation shows promise for treating ADHD in children
研究表明山核桃可能有助于预防肥胖和减少炎症德克萨斯 A&M AgriLife 科学家的一项合作研究表明，每天食用山核桃可以预防肥胖以及脂肪肝和糖尿病等一系列相关的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Pecans-may-help-prevent-obesity-and-reduce-inflammation-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Pecans-may-help-prevent-obesity-and-reduce-inflammation-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7104c35-6a5a-48bc-ad93-1828e7866504 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 22:33:39 -0400 Pecans may help prevent obesity and reduce inflammation, study shows
人工智能支持的乳房 X 光检查可以挽救生命并减少放射科医生的工作量人工智能 (AI) 支持的乳房 X 光检查是当今放射科医生传统双读的安全替代方案，可以减轻医生的繁重工作量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/AI-supported-mammography-screening-could-save-lives-and-reduce-workload-for-radiologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/AI-supported-mammography-screening-could-save-lives-and-reduce-workload-for-radiologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7b5be15-ce85-4612-96c7-57f3ac7f138c Tue, 01 Aug 2023 22:29:42 -0400 AI-supported mammography screening could save lives and reduce workload for radiologists
肾脏健康指标的长期模式可以预测心力衰竭风险他们说，一分预防胜于一分治疗。了解对哪个患者采取哪种预防性治疗无疑可以提高这一效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Long-term-patterns-in-kidney-health-indicators-may-predict-heart-failure-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Long-term-patterns-in-kidney-health-indicators-may-predict-heart-failure-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b9c3361-b605-4c22-b42a-6d7b666da86e Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:59:56 -0400 Long-term patterns in kidney health indicators may predict heart failure risk
加州大学旧金山分校医学中心入选全国顶级医院荣誉榜《美国新闻与世界报道》将 UCSF Health 成人护理中心的 7 个专科评为全国前 10 名医院，其中神经病学/神经外科和风湿病学领域位居西方最佳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/UCSF-Medical-Center-named-to-Honor-Roll-of-nations-top-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/UCSF-Medical-Center-named-to-Honor-Roll-of-nations-top-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2c49bd2-fe7b-41b9-bc8f-891580ec7746 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:58:24 -0400 UCSF Medical Center named to Honor Roll of nation's top hospitals
研究为驱动异位骨化的复杂细胞过程提供了新的见解在《Bone Research》杂志于 2023 年 7 月 21 日发表的一项新研究中，约翰·霍普金斯大学的一组研究人员结合谱系追踪和单细胞 RNA 测序 (scRNA-seq)，深入研究了滑膜/肌腱的贡献鞘祖细胞异位骨形成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-intricate-cellular-processes-driven-heterotopic-ossification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-intricate-cellular-processes-driven-heterotopic-ossification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efb7ccae-e79b-43e4-855d-a4d9e0a81748 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:34:00 -0400 Study provides new insights into the intricate cellular processes driving heterotopic ossification
AirGels：呼吸道感染研究的游戏规则改变者生物膜是高度耐药的细菌群落，对感染的治疗提出了重大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/AirGels-A-game-changer-for-research-on-respiratory-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/AirGels-A-game-changer-for-research-on-respiratory-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f72598e8-4e98-481e-bd5d-f423dddb7b07 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:29:08 -0400 AirGels: A game-changer for research on respiratory infections
